ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description: Tayaran was launched with a clear vision: that travel is not just about moving from one place to another, but a complete experience that begins with planning and booking, and extends all the way to reaching your destination. Therefore, the project developed a comprehensive digital platform that allows users to compare thousands of flight and hotel options and choose the most suitable ones with ease and transparency, while also offering innovative services unprecedented in the local market.

vision2030.title: Vision 2030 Partner
vision2030.description: We strive to play an active role in Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030 by supporting the growth of the tourism sector and enhancing the Kingdom's position as a leading global destination.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content:
A Saudi platform for hotel and flight bookings

"Tayyran" is an innovative Saudi platform that makes it easy for you to plan your trips, bringing together the best flight and hotel offers in one place.
We designed the platform to provide you with a smooth, transparent, and fast user experience where you can choose what's best for you in seconds—with the highest levels of confidence.

Tayyran is the trade name of QUSA Travel and Tourism Company, located at:
2339 Al Yasmin District – Anas Bin Malik Street – Office No. 10 – First Floor – Riyadh – Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

For any privacy-related inquiries:
info@qessatravel.com

dataWeCollect.title: Personal Data We Collect
dataWeCollect.content:
• Identity Data: Full name – Passport number – Nationality – Date of birth.
• Contact Data: Phone number – Email address – Residential address.
• Financial Data: Payment card – Invoices – Transaction history.
• Travel Data: Flight tickets – Hotels – Visas – Special requests.
• Sensitive Data (if necessary): Health information required for travel with your explicit consent.

howWeCollect.title: How We Collect Data
howWeCollect.content:
• Through booking on the website or application
• Direct communication with us
• Visiting our offices
• Through airlines, hotels, and service partners

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Data
howWeUse.content:
• Processing bookings
• Communication regarding trips and payments
• Providing customer service
• Sending offers with prior consent
• Compliance with laws and regulations

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
We may share your data with:
• Airlines
• Hotels
• Payment companies
• Government authorities
• Technical service providers

We do not sell your data to any party.

internationalTransfer.title: International Data Transfer
internationalTransfer.content: Data may be transferred outside the Kingdom only for completing bookings with guaranteed compliance with PDPL controls.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content:
We use:
• Encryption
• Fraud detection systems
• Secure servers
• Access permission restrictions

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content:
We retain data only throughout the period of:
• Service provision
• Legal requirements
• Dispute management

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content:
You have the right to:
• Access your data
• Request modification
• Request deletion
• Object to processing
• Withdraw consent

Via email: info@qessatravel.com

dataBreach.title: Data Breach
dataBreach.content: We will notify you and the competent authority in the event of any breach in accordance with legal requirements.

updates.title: Updates
updates.content: The policy may be updated, and amendments will be published on the website.

introductionAgreement.title: Introduction and Agreement Acceptance
introductionAgreement.content: These terms and conditions constitute a legally binding agreement between QUSA Travel and Tourism Company, as the owner and operator of the Tayyran platform, and any person who accesses, uses, or benefits from any service available through the website or affiliated applications.
points: Using the platform by any means constitutes explicit acknowledgment of the user's full and unconditional acceptance of all terms of this agreement
User's acknowledgment of possessing full legal capacity to enter into this agreement
User must be 18 years of age or older to use the service

platformNature.title: Nature of Platform's Role
platformNature.content: Tayyran platform operates as an independent electronic intermediary enabling users to search and book travel services provided by third parties.
points: Services include – without limitation – airlines, hotels, and accommodation service providers
The platform is not in any case considered an air carrier, operator, or owner of any hotel facility
Responsibility for service execution, quality, and continuity lies entirely with the relevant service provider
The platform operates as a technical intermediary and does not bear responsibility for service execution

termsModification.title: Terms Modification
termsModification.content: The company may modify the terms at any time without prior notice. Continued use constitutes explicit acceptance of the modified terms.
points: Terms may be modified at any time without prior notice
Modifications become effective immediately upon publication on the platform
Modifications do not apply retroactively to bookings confirmed before the modification date
Continued use of the platform after modifications constitutes acceptance of the amended terms

websiteAvailability.title: Website Availability
websiteAvailability.content: We strive to provide uninterrupted service, but we do not guarantee it will be free from technical failures or downtime. The site may be suspended for periodic maintenance or technical updates without prior notice.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
points: Technical errors
Payment failures
Service disruptions
Losses resulting from use
Flight and accommodation services are subject to providers' terms and relevant international agreements
Applicable agreements include the Montreal Convention for air transport
The platform is not responsible for any errors or omissions in displayed information

liabilityLimits.title: Financial Liability Limits
liabilityLimits.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Tayyran shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, consequential, or special damages, including loss of profits, data, or opportunities, resulting from using the platform or inability to use it. In all cases, if Tayyran's liability is legally established, the maximum limit of such liability shall not exceed the value of the amount actually paid by the user for the disputed booking.

acceptableBehavior.title: Acceptable Behavior
acceptableBehavior.content: The following activities are strictly prohibited:
points: Fake bookings
Unauthorized access attempts
Posting offensive content
Uploading malicious files
Using robots or automated copying tools
Violation of intellectual property rights
Prohibited: Making fictitious or speculative bookings
Prohibited: Attempting to hack systems or using automated tools or copying software
Prohibited: Publishing content that violates or infringes intellectual property rights
Prohibited: Using the platform for illegal purposes or in violation of regulations
User must be 18 years of age or older
User is committed to accuracy of information provided during booking

flightBookings.title: Flight Bookings and Travel Requirements
flightBookings.content: Flight bookings are subject to the following conditions:
points: User bears full responsibility for accuracy of traveler data and its conformity with passports
Responsibility for visa issuance, passport validity, and health requirements lies solely with the traveler
Displayed prices may not include some fees or local taxes collected directly by relevant authorities
In case of traveler no-show, airline policies apply
User is not entitled to claim any compensation from Tayyran platform due to no-show
Bookings are subject to specific airline terms and prices at time of booking

accommodationBookings.title: Accommodation Bookings (Hotels and Others)
accommodationBookings.content: Accommodation bookings are subject to the following conditions:
points: Hotel facility classifications are indicative and subject to local standards of each country
Some establishments may impose additional fees such as resort fees or city taxes paid directly upon check-in
Displayed photos and descriptions are provided by service providers, and the platform does not guarantee their complete conformity with reality
Any special requests are sent as non-binding requests to the service provider
Check-in and check-out times are subject to hotel establishment policies
Some offers may be non-refundable or non-modifiable according to hotel policy

serviceFees.title: Service Fees and Booking Management
serviceFees.content: The platform applies service fees for providing booking services and technical support:
points: User acknowledges that displayed prices may include service fees imposed by Tayyran platform
Service fees are for technical connectivity and providing booking services and technical support
These fees are non-refundable upon booking cancellation, unless otherwise stated
If user requests booking modifications, the platform has the right to impose additional administrative fees
Administrative fees include any price differences or penalties imposed by the service provider
User is informed of additional fees before confirming any modifications

refundPolicy.title: Financial Refund Policy
refundPolicy.content: Refund processes are subject to the following policies and conditions:
points: All refunds are subject to the original service provider's policies
If the service is non-refundable according to provider's policy, the platform cannot refund any amounts to the user
Refunds are processed through the original payment method
Refund period may take from 7 to 21 working days, or more depending on bank and provider procedures
The platform reserves the right to deduct fixed processing fees or a percentage of the refunded amount
Maximum processing fee is 5% of the refunded amount
Fees include processing costs, bank transfers, and any penalties imposed by the provider

providerChanges.title: Changes by Service Provider
providerChanges.content: In case the service provider makes changes to the booking:
points: If airline or hotel cancels or modifies the booking, the platform's role is limited to informing the user
Notification occurs immediately upon receiving official notice from the provider
The platform bears no legal or financial responsibility towards the user resulting from these changes
The case is handled according to the relevant provider's policy
Platform service fees remain non-refundable in all cases
User has the right to contact the service provider directly to follow up on claims

paymentsFraud.title: Fraud Management
paymentsFraud.content: The company has the right to:
points: Cancel suspicious bookings
Suspend accounts
Take legal actions
Impose 5% fees on exploitative cancellations
Deduction occurs immediately upon booking confirmation using approved payment methods
User is responsible for any unauthorized use of their payment methods
In case of suspected fraudulent activity, the platform has the right to cancel the booking immediately
The platform has the right to suspend or close the suspected account
Necessary legal procedures are taken against any fraudulent activity
All transactions are monitored for security and fraud prevention purposes

forceMajeure.title: Force Majeure
forceMajeure.content: Tayyran bears no responsibility in cases of force majeure:
points: Not responsible for delay or non-performance resulting from circumstances beyond its control
Force majeure circumstances include natural disasters and pandemics
Include government decisions and airspace closures
Include strikes and civil disturbances
Include major technical accidents beyond the platform's control
In such cases, relevant service providers' policies apply

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to compensate the company for any losses resulting from misuse of the platform. User agrees to indemnify and hold Tayyran harmless from any claims, losses, or damages arising from violation of these terms, providing incorrect information, or misuse of the platform. This includes all legal expenses and costs related to any lawsuits or claims.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All website content is owned by Tayyran. Copying or republishing without permission is prohibited. All platform content, trademarks, and designs are protected under applicable intellectual property laws in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and other countries. Their use, republication, copying, or modification by any means is prohibited without prior written permission from QUSA Travel and Tourism Company.

termsValidity.title: Terms Validity and Agreement Continuity
termsValidity.content: If any provision of this agreement is invalidated or deemed unenforceable by a competent court, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. Invalidity of any provision does not affect the validity or enforceability of any other provision of this agreement.

lawJurisdiction.title: Law and Jurisdiction
lawJurisdiction.content: These terms are subject to the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and its courts have jurisdiction over any disputes. This agreement is governed by the laws and regulations of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The courts of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia have exclusive jurisdiction to consider any dispute or disagreement arising from the interpretation or implementation of this agreement. The user expressly agrees to the exclusive judicial jurisdiction of the courts of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
